isis::util::check_type

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct isis::util::check_type< T >

Templated pseudo struct to check for availability of a type at compile time.

Instanciating this with any datatype (eg: check_type<short>() ) will cause the compiler to raise an error if this datatype is not in the list of the supported types.
